GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the details of an Appliance with a specified resource group and name.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates or updates an Appliance in the specified Subscription and Resource Group.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an Appliance with the specified Resource Name in the specified Resource Group and Subscription.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an Appliance with the specified Resource Name, Resource Group, and Subscription Id.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of Appliances in the specified subscription and resource group. The operation returns properties of each Appliance.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetResourceConnectorAppliances
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Gets a list of Appliances in the specified subscription. The operation returns properties of each Appliance

OtherOperations.Name: GetClusterUserCredential
OtherOperations.Description: Returns the cluster user credentials for the dedicated appliance.

OtherOperations.Name: GetKeys
OtherOperations.Description: Returns the cluster customer credentials for the dedicated appliance.

OtherOperations.Name: GetUpgradeGraph
OtherOperations.Description: Gets the upgrade graph of an Appliance with a specified resource group and name and specific release train.
